description: Форсирующая использование Tor операционная система, стремящаяся к анонимности, приватности и безопасности. Предлагает так-же готовые к использованию образы для виртуальных машин.
Enterprise klasa računarske platforme sa stopostotnom binarnom kompatibilnosti sa RHEL-om.
OMEMO or OTR encrypted IM for iOS.

Cjdns is a networking protocol, a system of digital rules for message exchange between computers. “Instead of letting other computers connect to you through a shared IP address which anyone can use, cjdns only lets computers talk to one other after they have verified each other cryptographically.
Conversations is an open source XMPP/Jabber client for Android 4.0+ smart phones.
Self-hosted, zero-knowledge, real-time collaborative documents.
notes: Encryption carried out in your web browser protects the data from the server, the cloud, and the NSA. The secret encryption key is stored in the URL fragment identifier which is never sent to the server but is available to javascript, so by sharing the URL, you give authorization to others who want to participate. Users must still take care to share links over an end-to-end-encrypted medium for best effect.

description: A convenience and ease-of-use layer for use on top of dm-crypt.
notes:
Gentoo maintains [a guide](https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/DM-Crypt_LUKS) for dm-crypt with LUKS.

Arch Linux also maintains [a guide](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Dm-crypt_with_LUKS) to dm-crypt with LUKS.

Slackware Linux also maintains [a guide](http://ftp.slackware.com/pub/slackware/slackware-14.1/README_CRYPT.TXT) to dm-crypt with LUKS.

dm-crypt is available for DragonFly BSD.

description: Popularne GNU/Linux distribucije.

Protects you against tracking through “free”, centralized, content delivery. It prevents a lot of requests from reaching networks like Google Hosted Libraries, and serves local files to keep sites from breaking. Complements regular content blockers.
Distribuirana društvena mreža.
A tool to secure communications between a client and a DNS resolver.
Poptpuno anonimno pretraživanje.
notes:
DuckDuckGo is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) hosted around the world that provides you with anonymous search results from [these sources](https://help.duckduckgo.com/results/sources). DDG open source components are [available here](https://github.com/duckduckgo).

There is also a DuckDuckGo hidden service at [3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion](http://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion) for Tor users.

description: OpenPGP dodatak za Thunderbird/Icedove.
notes: [Here is a guide](https://securityinabox.org/en/guide/thunderbird/linux/) by Security In A Box to encrypting your email with Mozilla Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail. Also read the [Email Self-Defense guide](https://emailselfdefense.fsf.org) by the Free Software Foundation to learn how to encrypt your email messages.

description: Višekorisnički kalkulacioni server.
notes: The EtherCalc online service encrypts your data transmission with HTTPS, but data may be read by anyone who can guess the URL. Download and run your own EtherCalc server if you care about privacy.

Brz, stabilan i moćan GNU/Linux.
Свободная операционная система, основанная на BSD.
FreedomBox integriše zaštitu privatnosti na cheap plug serveru tako da svi mogu da imaju privatnost.
Nekomercijalna otvorena alternativa za podržavanje besplatnih radio mreža u celom svetu.
Distribuirana društvena mreža koja poštuje našu privatnost.
Disk encryption subsystem included in the FreeBSD operating system.
Sinhronizovani folder na vašem računaru ili disku.
Self hosted git server.
Open, free and neutral wireless network for everyone.
Šifrujte komunikaciju između hiljada sajtova.
Hubzilla is a powerful platform for creating interconnected websites (hubs) featuring a decentralized identity, communications, and permissions framework built using common webserver technology.
Nevidljivi internet projekat.
Приложение для Android устройств со встроенной поддержкой PGP.

Application for people with extremely high demands on secure personal data management. Saves many different types of information such as usernames, passwords, urls, attachments and comments in one single database.
OpenPGP šifrovanje za webmail.
Monero is a secure, private, untraceable P2P currency.
notes: Please note that new, digital currencies may be volatile. Complete loss of your investment is possible for a number of reasons (software errors or attacks, identity theft, etc.). Be prepared!

description: Privatni decentralizovani server za društvene mreže.
Internet pregledač otvorenog koda.
Email aplikacija otvorenog koda.
notes:
Thunderbird does not encrypt your email by default. [Here is a guide](https://securityinabox.org/en/guide/thunderbird/linux/) by Security In A Box to encrypting your email with Mozilla Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail.

Thunderbird can optionally connect over Tor with the TorBirdy addon.

While Thunderbird can be used as a chat and IRC client, it does not offer encrypted messaging.

description: Šifrovani razgovori niske latencije.
Distribuirani DNS baziran na Bitcoin tehnologiji.
Uključi JavaScript, Java i Flash samo na web stranicama kojima veruješ.

A free dynamic DNS service. Use it to update an easy DNS name with your changing/hard-to-remember IP address. As we use the standard protocols, we support a lot of routers / update clients and we even actively help you to configure them. We care for your security, privacy and comfort. You can simply use the free service available on our homepage or, if you prefer, you can also run the software on your own server.
Sigurno pretraživanje za iOS.
OpenKeychain is an OpenPGP implementation for Android.
Безопасная BSD операционная система.
Besplatne mape širom sveta.
A GNU/Linux distribution for embedded devices.
Tor proxy za Android.
OsmAnd (OSM Automated Navigation Directions) is a map and navigation app that uses OpenStreetMap data.
Tracking blocker that tries to learn who is spying on you and then blocks these ads and invisible trackers.
notes: Privacy Badger may be less effective than a classic blacklist based solution such as uBlock or Disconnect. Advertisers can automatically unblock themselves by claiming not to track you.

description: Multi-platform IM client for power users with built-in OTR support.
Lično hostovan steam server.
Основанная на Fedora/Xen операционная система созданная для обеспечения высокого уровня безопасности с помощью изоляции.
Besplana i sigurna P2P komunikaciona platforma.
notes:
Note that RetroShare has not been thoroughly audited by security professionals for possible security issues.

For those of you without a server, RetroShare is probably the easiest way to start your own encrypted social network.

description: Ring is a secure and distributed voice, video and chat communication platform that requires no centralized server and leaves the power of privacy in the hands of the user.
Sigurni i privatni email nalozi.
notes: Riseup's services may also be accessed via their Tor Hidden Service addresses. A list is [available here](https://www.riseup.net/en/tor#riseups-tor-hidden-services).

description: The personal, minimalist, super-fast, no-database delicious clone.
A fork of TextSecure with SMS encryption.
Continuous decentralized file synchronization.
notes: Syncthing is a self-hosted file sharing platform, so none of your data is ever stored anywhere other than on your computers. There is no central server that might be compromised, legally or illegally. All communication is secured using TLS. The encryption used includes perfect forward secrecy to prevent any eavesdropper from gaining access to your data. Every node is identified by a strong cryptographic certificate. Only nodes you have explicitly allowed can connect to your cluster.

description: Besplatan i otvoren cloud servis.
Live CD/USB distribucije dizajnirane da štite privatnost.
Free software daemon that uses tunnelling and encryption to create a secure private network

Tor (previously TOR, an acronym for The Onion Router)[not in citation given] is free software for enabling online anonymity. Tor directs Internet traffic through a free, worldwide, volunteer network consisting of more than four thousand relays to conceal a user's location or usage from anyone conducting network surveillance or traffic analysis. Using Tor makes it more difficult to trace Internet activity, including “visits to Web sites, online posts, instant messages, and other communication forms”, back to the user and is intended to protect the personal privacy of users, as well as their freedom and ability to conduct confidential business by keeping their internet activities from being monitored.
Šifrovano anonimno pretraživanje.
Заставляет Thunderbird и Icedove использовать Tor.
notes: TorBirdy is in beta and should be considered experimental. Please make sure that before using it, you are aware of the known issues and leaks by reading the “Before using TorBirdy” and “Known TorBirdy” Issues sections on the project website.

description: An efficient blocker for Firefox and Chromium. Fast and lean.
Client-side encrypted image host web server.
notes: Up1 is a simple host that client-side encrypts images, text, and other data, and stores them, with the server knowing nothing about the contents. It has the ability to view images, text with syntax highlighting, short videos, and arbitrary binaries as downloadables.

description: wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages. Unlike other services, wallabag is free (as in freedom) and open source.
